name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Platform Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in delivering high-performance applications in compliance-driven sectors. Proficient in **Go**, **Rust**, **C++**, and **Scala**, with expertise in blockchain technologies including **smart contracts**, **EVM**, **Foundry**, and **Solidity**. Demonstrated ability in designing and implementing **CI/CD** pipelines, enhancing system performance, and ensuring observability in production environments. Experienced in developing technical documentation and optimizing algorithms and data structures for scalable solutions.
Prior experience includes building AI/ML-powered platforms utilizing JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and **Flutter**, with hands-on expertise in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Skilled in deploying **cloud-native systems** on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices and event-driven architectures, while maintaining compliance with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong background in MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
